title: Revisiting In-Gas Transformations of Quinate Conjugates Through the LC-qTOF-MS and Molecular Networking Topology.
abstract: The emergence of computational metabolomics tools such as molecular networking and machine learning-based platforms like SIRIUS has significantly advanced MS-based metabolomics studies. These tools enable rapid metabolite identification by deciphering complex fragmentation patterns and chemical transformations occurring during mass spectrometry analysis.
journal: Rapid communications in mass spectrometry : RCM
